== Parappukkara (CT) (627923) ==

Parappukkara (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 14.82 sq. km. and harbouring 3035 households with total population of 11893 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 21 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 360 km. Male population is 5703 and female population is 6190. Scheduled Caste population is 1813 and Scheduled Tribes population is 7. Census Location Code of the town is 627923<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 21 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 65 km. Railway station is at Nellayi at a distance of 3 km.
